question: Jagadekamalla II's rule is associated with which of the following periods?
explanation: The Later Chalukyan King Somesvara III was succeeded by Jagadekamalla II who ruled from 1135 to 1151 AD. This was followed by an invasion of the Chalukya territory by the Hoyasalas. Taila III came to the throne after the death of Jagadekamalla II.
